name: Elevens up!
description:
The classic bar game 11s up now in your hands.

Click on the uncovered cards to total 11 points, (Aces are worth 1 point) get 11 and those cards remove from the deck. Can't make 11 points? Then you can draw from the pile on the bottom for new cards which will fill empty spots on the board.

The faster you go, with least errors is more the multiplier will grow!

Chase yourself and see how high you can score!
